docs.snippet: Dr. and Mrs. Oscar A. Palatucci of Pelham, N.Y., and Pompano Beach, Fla., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Marion Palatucci, to Jeffrey Barker Shields of Washington, son of the late Mr. and Mrs. Joseph Lane Shields of Williamsburg,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. and Mrs. Oscar A. Palatucci of Pelham, N.Y., and Pompano Beach, Fla., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Marion Palatucci, to Jeffrey Barker Shields of Washington, son of the late Mr. and Mrs. Joseph Lane Shields of Williamsburg, Va.

headline.main: Jeffrey Barker Shields Fiance of Miss Palatucci

docs.snippet: The world's leading collections of antiquities from the Near East are sprinkled with fakes, according to a research paper that is causing a stir in the museum world....
docs.lead_paragraph: The world's leading collections of antiquities from the Near East are sprinkled with fakes, according to a research paper that is causing a stir in the museum world.

headline.main: Some Antiquities Challenged; Some Objects in the Top Antiquities Collections Are Challenged 'A Crude Parody' The Price of Plunder

docs.snippet: The world's leading collections of antiquities from the Near East are sprinkled with fakes, according to a research paper that is causing a stir in the museum world....
docs.lead_paragraph: The world's leading collections of antiquities from the Near East are sprinkled with fakes, according to a research paper that is causing a stir in the museum world.
docs.abstract: Study by Oscar White Muscarella of Met Museum of world's leading collections of antiquities from Near East lists 247 art objects or groups of objects as suspicious or evident forgeries; it appears that many millions of dollars are involved; C C Lamberg-Karlovsky, dir of Peabody Museum at Harvard, says more serious is effect on scholarship; some other art officials comment; illus (M)

headline.main: Some Antiquities Challenged; Some Objects in the Top Antiquities Collections Are Challenged 'A Crude Parody' The Price of Plunder

docs.snippet: Oscar L. Chapman, a key strategist for the Democratic Party during the Roosevelt and Truman Administrations and a senior official of the Department of the Interior for 20 years, died yesterday in Washington, D.C., after a long illness. He was 81 y...
docs.lead_paragraph: Oscar L. Chapman, a key strategist for the Democratic Party during the Roosevelt and Truman Administrations and a senior official of the Department of the Interior for 20 years, died yesterday in Washington, D.C., after a long illness. He was 81 years old.

headline.main: OSCAR L. CHAPMAN, 81; AIDE TO PRESIDENTS; Strategist for the Democratic Party Under Roosevelt and Truman Became Interior Secretary Trouble Shooter for Democrats Boss's Senate Campaign the Start
